thread.title: BRIEF-The Dixie Group Reports Qtrly Loss Per Share $0.60‍​

title: BRIEF-The Dixie Group Reports Qtrly Loss Per Share $0.60‍​
text: March 1, 2018 / 10:41 AM / Updated 24 minutes ago BRIEF-The Dixie Group Reports Qtrly Loss Per Share $0.60‍​ Reuters Staff March 1 (Reuters) - Dixie Group Inc: * THE DIXIE GROUP REPORTS 2017 RESULTS * DIXIE GROUP INC - QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE $0.60‍​ * DIXIE GROUP INC - QTRLY NET SALES $105.1 MILLION VERSUS $102.6 MILLION * DIXIE GROUP - BENEFIT FROM TAX ACT WAS $8.2 MILLION IN 2017 * DIXIE GROUP - 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES PLANNED AT MAINTENANCE LEVEL OF ABOUT $6 MILLION VERSUS $13.6 MILLION SPENT IN CAPITAL ASSET ACQUISITIONS IN 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
